thread.title: Four new 'Transformers' movies on the way
thread.title_full: Four new 'Transformers' movies on the way

title: Four new 'Transformers' movies on the way
text: "Furious 7" is the latest in the very popular "Fast and Furious" franchise. Hide Caption 3 of 16 16 photos: Popular sequels The first "Godzilla" film received wide release in the U.S. in 1956, and a monster 28 sequels or reboots have been made since. "Godzilla 2," the sequel to the 2014 version of the monster story, is expected in 2018. Hide Caption 4 of 16 16 photos: Popular sequels "Star Trek" may reign as the most successful film franchise to transition from TV. Six movies in the original film series, four "Next Generation" films and two of the newest iteration have boldly gone where few franchises have gone before. Another is scheduled for release in 2016. Hide Caption 5 of 16 16 photos: Popular sequels Believe it or not, there have been only 12 "Friday the 13th" films. The horror franchise has been prolific but hasn't reached the (un)lucky number 13. Hide Caption 6 of 16 16 photos: Popular sequels Never has a franchise been more heavily debated and picked apart. "Star Wars" has an original trilogy of films, three prequels, an upcoming sequel trilogy and a planned spinoff, "Star Wars: Rogue One," expected in theaters in December 2016. Hide Caption 7 of 16 16 photos: Popular sequels Another scary movie franchise that has pumped them out has been the "Halloween" films. There have been 10 in total, including a 2007 reboot directed by rocker Rob Zombie. Hide Caption 8 of 16 16 photos: Popular sequels There have been 13 "The Land Before Time" films since 1988. The newest in the animated franchise is subtitled "Journey of the Heart" and is due in 2015. Hide Caption 9 of 16 16 photos: Popular sequels "Pirates of the Caribbean" has an original trilogy as well as a standalone sequel, "Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides," in 2011. "Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales" is set to hit theaters in 2017. Hide Caption 10 of 16 16 photos: Popular sequels The folks behind the four "American Pie" films have found a comedic recipe that fans love: sex, unrequited love and juvenile humor. "American Pie 5" is said to be coming in 2015. Hide Caption 11 of 16 16 photos: Popular sequels Some may call the horror franchise "Saw" "torture porn," but it's been popular enough to inspire seven films. Hide Caption 12 of 16 16 photos: Popular sequels What would the '80s have been without the "Police Academy" movies? The comedies about a group of bumbling cops had seven films in total. Hide Caption 13 of 16 16 photos: Popular sequels The four "Scream" films have grossed hundreds of millions of dollars. The original movie was one of the highest-grossing slasher films ever. Hide Caption 14 of 16 16 photos: Popular sequels The story of an aspiring boxer from the tough streets of Philadelphia helped propel "Rocky" to five sequels, including 2006's "Rocky Balboa." Hide Caption 15 of 16 16 photos: Popular sequels Will we ever get there? Final Destination has had five films about groups of people trying to avoid the Grim Reaper. "Final Destination 5" in 2011 garnered favorable reviews. Hide Caption
